description: This is a group for anyone interested in learning and playing Texas Hold Em poker.  This is NOT a group for professional poker players - this group is more catered to beginners and intermediate players who like to play poker or play occasionally.  It is also a chance to meet other poker players or avid enthusiasts about poker in the Zurich area.  Games are limited to 6-8 people only and meetups will be held every 6-8 weeks.  Hope to see you at one of the meetups.
name: Learn and play TX HoldEm Poker / Spielen und lernen Poker

description:
This is a group for anyone interested to discuss how to lead digital transformation and innovation, in order to enhance customer experience. 

We are entering in a new age of digital economy, business environment is invaded by millions of digital tools. This leads significant changes in the way business works, communicates and sell. Driven by the convergence of mobility, analytics, social media, cloud computing, and embedded devices, now is time to lead digital in all your business.

The group is open to all - anyone interested to discuss and propose new digital (and not digital as well) innovations that can help companies improve their customers' experiences. They are also welcome those who simply want to stay in touch with group's members and be updated on new Digital Innovation trends.

Group members will be invited to attend, and actively partecipate on: meetings, discussions and conferences on various topics related to CX digital innovation.

Following are some of the main subjects that will be touched in the various discussions and meetings:

• New Digital innovation trend in the market ... the future is now!

• Digital Customer Experience

• Lead Digital Innovation Transformation (vision, challenges, investments, culture and engagement, mobilizing and ROI)

• Digital Innovation transformation Maturity Model: became CX Digital Innovation Master

• and many more ...


Following some of the sub-subjects that will be discussed as well:

• New technology revolution

• Customer Experience Management

• Customer Intelligence 

• Voice of Customer 

• Data Analytics (from customer behaviour to Big Data)

• Customer Relationship Management

• Social Media

• and many more ...


We want you to be part of this digital innovative group, we look forward to organize the first meeting.
name: DICX - Digital Innovation for Customer Experience

description:
What is StartupBlink?

StartupBlink is an interactive global startup ecosystem map with tens of thousands of entities listed including Startups, Coworking spaces and Accelerators.

StartupBlink allows startup entities to blink their recent news, receive relevant information and connect with each other based on their stated needs. http://startupblink.com

Who organizes the events?

The events are organized by the local startup community (That means You!). Our meetup groups have a community leader (Please let us know if you are interested to become one), and random events are welcomed as well, so please let us know if you want to organize an event and we will post it. All meetups are according to term of use as can be seen on Startupblink.com

What should you expect from our Meetups?

StartupBlink's meetups are focused on helping startups grow their business by supplying them with insightful information from startup leaders in the local community, and facilitating connection with other entrepreneurs to create and discover potential synergies.

Who should join this Meetup?

We welcome everyone with interest in their local startup ecosystem to join, including startup founders, Co-working and Accelerators staff and anyone who is interested to learn more and take active part in their local startup community.
name: StartupBlink Zürich

description:
Text in Deutsch and English 


Seit Alle vom Herzen Gegrüsst

Auch in diesem Monat möchte ich euch einige Meet up`s anbieten. Nach dem ich bemerkt habe das mehrere Teilnehmer in meinen beiden Gruppen eine Facebook Mentalität besitzen und es auf virtuelle Bekanntschaften und Begegnungen beruhen lassen, möchte ich gerne etwas über die Hintergründe der Aktivitäten meiner Gruppen mit euch teilen.

Ich bin sehr viel in meinem Leben gereist und habe in vielen verschiedenen Ländern und Kulturen gelebt, somit fällt es mir leicht den Schwach Punkt einer Kultur oder Mentalität zu erkennen. Hier im Westen von Europa sind die Menschen emotional sehr unterkühlt und mir ist aufgefallen, dass nicht alle aber viele Menschen darunter leiden. 

Nun sag ich mir immer:

“ Nicht alle Begebenheiten müssen wir annehmen und akzeptieren wir können etwas unternehmen um für uns selbst die Lebensqualität zu erhöhen und uns folglich wohler und gesunder fühlen. Wir können nicht die Gesellschaft ändern aber wir können etwas in unserem unmittelbaren Umfeld ändern denn auch wir sind Teil der Gesellschaft.“

Aus diesem Grund habe ich mit zwei Gruppen angefangen 

1. Luzern Meditation Meetup: 

http://www.meetup.com/Luzern-Meditation-Meetup/

2. Massage und Spirituelle Heilung 

http://www.meetup.com/Massage-And-Spiritual-Healing-Meetup/

Dies ist eine Einladung wieder unter uns gesündere zwischenmenschliche Beziehungen aufzubauen. Wir wollen Menschen anziehen, die gerne anderen Menschen von Herz zu Herz begegnen und spüren wollen. Hierbei geht es nicht nur darum wie man heißt und welchen Beruf man ausübt sondern es geht um Begegnung mit dem Herzen.

So wie sich unsere Körper von Nahrung nähren ähnlich nährt sich unsere Seele von Liebe und Zuwendung. Diese Liebe und Zuwendung schränken wir auf unsere Familie und Partner ein, aber auch hier haben wir eine Möglichkeit Gegebenheiten in unserem unmittelbaren Umfeld zu hinterfragen und eventuell sogar auf gesündere Art und Weise zu ändern. Wir sind nicht gezwungen alles anzunehmen und nachzuahmen, was uns die Gesellschaft vorlebt.

Somit möchte ich die Menschen unter Euch ansprechen, die ein ähnliches Bedürfnis haben.

Für die von Euch die sich für Praxis orientierte spirituelle Themen interessieren und tiefer gehen wollen habe ich ein Buch in deutsch geschrieben:

Die Kunst Des Werdens Innerhalb der Kunst Des Seins

Ich wünsche Euch Allen eine wunderschöne Zeit

Liebe Grüsse Darius

Über Massage und Heilung


In unserem täglichen Leben begegnen wir vielen Situationen, die Konzentration benötigen und oft halten wir dabei  Teile unseres Körpers unbewusst sehr angespannt. Durch die Spannungen blockieren wir den Fluss der Lebensenergie in unserem System und wir fühlen uns dann erschöpft und müde.

Massage zu lernen, ist eine wunderbare Gelegenheit, eine Balance in unserem Leben und das Leben unserer Partner zu bringen. So können wir unsere Lebensenergie wieder in positiven Fluss bringen. Es gibt viele Methoden der Massage, aber am wichtigsten ist eine intuitive Art und Weise zu lernen, weil jeder Körper etwas anders ist und eine Anpassungsfähigkeit gefragt ist. Außerdem brauchen wir einen intuitiven Ansatz, um Bereiche zu erkennen die mehr Aufmerksamkeit brauchen als vielleicht andere. 

Ich werde dir die wichtigsten Grundlagen von Massage vermitteln, was sie bewirkt und was beachtet werden muss, um gefahrlos massieren zu können. Auf diese Weise kannst du dein eigenen Style entwickeln. Wir werden dann im Anschluss einen sanften Übergang zur Heilarbeit machen, indem wir gemeinsam lernen, wie man sich mit der heilenden Energie verbindet und an die Person, die wir behandelt,  weiter fließen lässt. Dies ist eine sehr schöne Kombination,  die Massage zu geben, wobei der Körper sehr entspant und rezeptiv wird und dann mit einer Heilsitzung abschließt. Mit dieser wunderbaren Kombination berühren wir den Körper und wir berühren die Seele und schenken unserem Gegenüber äußere und innere Harmonie und Ausgeglichenheit.



Darius hat viele Jahre in Asien gelebt , wo er unter anderem 4 Jahre als buddhistischer Mönch lebte. Er lernte Massagen und Heilmethoden wie sie von den Mönchen angewandt werden, um ihre Gesundheit in einem guten Zustand zu halten. Auch lernte er klassische Massage und Aspekte der hawaiischen Lomi Lomi Massage


Greetings to all of you from my heart

Also in this Month, I would like to offer you some Meet up `s. After I have noticed that several members in my two groups have a Facebook mentality based on virtual acquaintances and encounters. I would like to share something about the background of the activities of my groups with you.

I have traveled a lot in my life and have lived in many different countries and cultures. So it is easy for me to see and recognize the weak point of a culture or mentality. In the western part of Europe, people are emotionally very cold and I've noticed that not all, but many people suffer under this condition. 

What I always say to myself:

"Not all things within our society we have to accept. We can do something to improve the quality of life for ourselves and consequently feel better and healthier. We cannot change society but we can change something in our close environment because we too are part of society. "

For this reason I have started two groups 

1.Luzern Meditation Meetup, 

http://www.meetup.com/Luzern-Meditation-Meetup/

2. Massage And Spiritual Healing.

 http://www.meetup.com/Massage-And-Spiritual-Healing-Meetup/

This is an invitation: again to build up healthier interpersonal relations among us. We want to attract people who would like to meet other people from heart to heart. This is not just about virtual friendship or surface conversations what is your name and what is your profession, but it's about meeting other persons from heart to heart.

Just as our body is nourished by food in a similar way our soul is nourished by love and affection. This love and affection we normally restrict to our family and partner. But here again we have an opportunity to change conditions in our immediate environment, to change to a healthier way of life. We are not obliged to accept everything that is expressed by our society.

With this letter I wish to attract those of you who think similar.

For those of you interested in spiritual matters and want to go deeper, I wrote a book unfortunately only available in German:

Die Kunst Des Werdens Innerhalb Der Kunst Des Seins

(The Art Of Becoming Within The Art Of Being)

I wish you a wonderful time

Light and love from my heart

Darius

About Massage And Healing

In our daily live we face many situations that need a lot of concentration and often we keep parts of our body subconsciously very tense. Trough tension we block the flow of vital energy in our system and end up feeling very exhausted and tierd. 

To learn Massage is a lovely way to bring a balance in our life and the life of our partner and to spend some time to get our vital energy again in to a positiv flow. 

There are many methods of Massage but most important is to learn a intuitive way because everyone’s body is slightly different. Also we need an intuitive approach in order to find and pinpoint the areas that need more attention. 

I will teach you the important thinks you have to know about doing Massage correctly without risk of health damage. In this way you can learn to develop your own style.
We will also learn together how to connect to the healing energy and to let it flow to the Person whom we treat. This is a very nice combination to do the Massage to relax the body and then to end with a healing session in this way we will touch the body and soul and give outer and inner harmony that rebalances our system.


Darius has lived many years in Asia where he lived also for 4 years as a Buddhist monk. He learnt massage and healing methods used by monks to keep their health in good shape. Also he learned classical massage and aspects of Lomi Lomi Hawaiian.
name: Massage And Spiritual Healing Meetup

description:
Warm welcome to INNER DANCE…a space to really be!. Our intention is to offer a space for people to connect to their soul and infinite wisdom within, and let yourself be moved by it, heal, releasing, finding and dancing your visions and quests, expressing your inner journeys and life, expanding your consciousness!…stepping into their authentic self

Why INNER DANCE?

Together on this planet & in the dance of life, I feel it is vital to express ourselves through our deepest soul yearnings, connect within & reach out in the most authentic, conscious and knowing way...Only in this way we can be truly free and share the things which make us vibrant, free, authentic, to contribute to the global community in a deeply nurturing/nurtured way. Balancing the in&out, flow of life, inhale, exhale, authentically being...

What is INNER DANCE?

Inner Dance is the Infinite expression of Energy that takes us to our Highest Potential. It is a gift to you from your Higher Self that offers healing, inner wisdom, and expands your consciousness, creativity and intuitive faculties. It starts from deep within beyond the ego and conscious mind. It is not a “dance” in the way typically expressed as we are not “dancing”, we become the movement itself. Dance is usually something coordinated by the brain which tells the body to move. The Inner Dance is a meditative, automatic, kundalini rise and spontaneous movement of the self that actually catches the ego and the conscious mind by surprise.

Everyone’s expression of this movement is different. It speaks to us, opens us up to what we need to heal, learn, envision, dance, remember, dream, co-create, etc.
Anyone interested in healing and experiencing the Infinite within are welcome! This is a space to free yourself, be ecstatic, find stillness, connection to oneself and the Universe!


Facilitated by listening to peaceful music and sounds, we flow and access our deeper conciousness and let go of our mind, and revisit patterns from the past, discover blockages, unconcious wounds and emotion, desires and process them in a peaceful healing way.

It started six years ago in the Philippines, and it was created by local healer Pi Villaraza after a two years retreat in solitude in a deserted island in Philippines, and is a guided process in which the participants are invited to unwind and go inside and expand their conciousness in a natural way.

Pi Villaraza’s quote:
“In less than twenty words, how would you describe Inner Dance? In total silence, it’s that river that flows from the cosmos and into your heart. It’s dancing from the higher self, and simply watching it move to the flow of the universe.”
“Whats the inner dance for? I believe it is here to uncover its meaning individually and it’s through the unique gifts of us all that the inner dance finds its full expression and its evolution through individually practicing it”

Facilitated by Marta Farré Ros, Sebastian Rombout and Marco Di Giano.

Marta Farré Ros is an Advanced Craniosacral therapist, Chi Kung teacher, intuitive healer, Birth Doula and Inner Dance facilitator.
email: marta.craniosacral@gmail.com
www.facebook.com/CraniosacralTherapyDoula

Sebastian Rombout is a Holistic Counsellor and Inner Dance facilitator.

Marco Di Giano is a Life Coach & Sri Sri Yoga Teacher.

Where are the classes taking place?
At Wahe Guru in Zurich, once a month.
At Eka espace in Geneve, once a month.

Step into Inner Dance, to explore, deeply reconnect to yourself and the Universe, access your inner wisdom, free yourself through authentic meditative movement-dance, expand and be!!
name: INNER DANCE conscious spontaneous meditative soul mov-dance

description:
This group is open to anyone interested to improve their communication skills and become a top-class, effective trainer: either you already feel confident as a speaker and want to further develop as a trainer or you just need to become a quality trainer because it's important in your job, business or other. 
You should already have experience as a speaker or a trainer as the main focus of our meetings is not on basic aspects of public speaking.

What you get in Trainers Pool sessions:
– we work together to become effective trainers – we give and get
– exchange ideas, experience, best practice 
– get hands-on experience
– experiment with new training ideas, methods
– networking with other (future) trainers

The goal in the longer run is our group ideally develops into a group of effective trainers who can deliver trainings on topics related to their expertise.  So besides the training sessions we organize for ourselves, we could also organize trainings for public or specific audiences.

External experienced trainers are welcome to lead workshops at our meetings, too. If you have any tips, just let me know.

Our meetings will be also a good opportunity for networking. You're more than welcome to invite your friends who would like to improve their training skills (provided they are advanced speakers already or have training experience).
name: Trainers Pool: Become a First-Class Trainer!

description:
A sort of "art/creativity" group to meet every week or every other week. I lived in Berlin last year and started a fiction writing group that was quite a success and I think everyone involved really benefited from sharing their work and talking over their ideas. This time around, if there's enough interest, I'd like to open it up to other media. Fiction, non-fiction, poetry, visual art, culinary etc. Basically anything that can easily be shared and talked over in a coffeehouse setting. Music and Film would be good too, but trickier. I thought it could be interesting and also create potential for collaborations e.g. graphic novels, short films, illustrated/photographed stories etc.

In terms of organisation, it'd be nice to look in depth at two/three individuals' work, especially for longer work, with leftover time spent with people sharing freely, brainstorming, just chatting or whatever.

There's also potential for creative meetings. These could involve workshops, creative exercises, or just working freely together. Depending on resources and what people could contribute, possible examples could include painting workshops, working together in a music room, meditation and flow art etc.

Ideas:

-For critiquing, have people send work out ahead of time if possible, so that people have a chance to look at it in depth. During meetups, focus on these before opening up to spontaneous sharing. 

-Workshops/presentations/info sessions from people on various topics and disciplines from craft, to the creative process, to art/writing as a profession.  

-Side project wherein members of the group take inspiration from the work of their peers, responding to it in their chosen medium, starting a chain 

-Eventually organizing a website/publication for our group. 

-Dividing meetups into "critique/presentation" sessions and "creative workshops." 

-Move meetups around Zurich

-Find places to run creative workshops (for example, I've gained access to a well-equipped music room that could be fun)

Also, if anyone is interested in helping with organization and management of the group, please let me know. Math keeps me busy and I'd appreciate it. I of course hope everyone will feel free to take initiative and voice ideas for/help with events, run workshops, meetings etc. Thanks!

<br>
name: Zürich: Interdisciplinary Art Circle

description:
ZürichPHP

(Mostly) monthly meetups talking about topics directly related to PHP, want to speak? Get in touch!

Code of Conduct

Zürich is a melting pot of cultures and languages. Its mix of residents and tourists lead to unique combinations and every tech group inherits this diversity. Much like Zürich, our development community is also diverse in many aspects, from our origins and culture to our choice of framework and language.

ZürichPHP wishes to create a friendly environment for every developer it encounters, everyone should feel comfortable and safe in our events and online community. More than that we wish this community to be a meeting point, a place where you can come and make new friends.

This CoC is a formalization of our beliefs, it is here to offer to you, our member, the guarantee that we will do our best to provide you with a safe environment in which to grow your knowledge base and your network. For this we count on you also, to be aware of our inherent differences and to respect different opinions and cultures, to be respectful and kind to others.

Organizers of ZürichPHP reserve the right to remove any participant, violating the spirit of this code, from the premises and take further action as necessary, be that reporting to higher authorities or banning members from future events and participation.

Harassment includes offensive verbal comments related to gender, age, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, religion, sexual images in public spaces, deliberate intimidation, stalking, following, harassing photography or recording, sustained disruption of talks or other events, inappropriate physical contact, and unwelcome sexual attention.

These values and rules extend to everyone, members, invited speakers, sponsors and anyone participating in the User Group and any of our activities.

We also count on you to be discreet and report any issues privately to our organizers so they can be handled in the best way possible without causing embarrassment and further stress to any of the involved parties.

This is your community, its up to you to keep it safe and welcoming. Welcome to our group, we wish you great times and enjoyment while you are with us, and hope to launch each of you into a bright future, either with knowledge and friends or by helping you become a speaker or library developer.

Welcome to ZürichPHP.
name: Zürich PHP

description:
This group is about making healthy natural probiotic foods such as fermented vegetables, kefir, yogurt, kombucha, kvass, etc.

Some of our great-grandmothers used to make these foods in the past, but the tradition got lost somewhere in the last two generations. Why did that happen? Convenience foods arrived to the markets, our lives got busier than ever, etc. The point is, we are realizing that the benefits of consuming these foods outnumber the inconvenience to prepare them. 

When I read about how beneficial eating fermented food is, I wanted to learn more! I bought a couple of books and found lots of resources online, but I did not find any local group. There are many in the UK, US, and other countries, but none here. What I was missing was someone I could ask directly how to do it, what about if something went wrong? What was the taste like? Would I like it? So I attended a couple of workshops available in other countries and I started experimenting at home with the easy ferments, and eventually with other ferments such as jalapeños, which is now part of our diet. Instead of buying jalapeños in vinegar from the shop, we buy the fresh ones and after about a week of fermenting we have not only delicious jalapeños, but also full of probiotics and live enzymes as a condiment for some of our meals. The only problem is that is goes too fast! 

If you have never fermented in the past, the basic workshop is then for you. You will learn how easy it is to make these super foods and how it is not so time-consuming when you install a routine around it. The benefits you will encounter are enormous and it is really worth a try! 

All the questions above and more is what I intend to explain in our hands-on workshop. You will get to try these foods before you make them. You will find out about the benefits of second fermenting, of live enzymes, what probiotics are, why they are important, etc. I also have some books you can check out during the workshop. 

Some of the well-known benefits of fermented foods are:

- better digestion
- improve your immune system
- easy intake of vitamin C
- live and good bacteria colonisation of our gut flora 

If you would like to find out more about fermenting, I recommend these websites:

- Wild fermentation
- Cultured vegetables
- More about the benefits of cultured foods

Are you already fermenting and would like to join a community of fermenters to exchange recipes or share your fermenting ideas? This is the group for you then! Let’s revive this tradition here in Switzerland! Let’s create a community of fermenters and let’s get healthier in the process!
name: Fermented Foods Meetup

description:
Connectors are people who know many, many more people than the average, and love introducing them to one another. Usually, you will only find a handful of them at an event. Let's see what happens if the event is exclusively made for them :-)


--------------

"It has become part of our accepted wisdom that six degrees (or fewer!) is all that separates us from anyone else in the world. How can that be? Because some of those degrees (people) know many, many more people than the rest of us.
Call them super-connectors. We all know at least one person like this individual, who seems to know everybody and whom everybody seems to know."

"The key is not only that we know thousands of people, but that we know thousands of people in many different worlds, and we know them well enough to give them a call. Once you become friendly with a super-connector, you're only two degrees away from the thousands of different people we know."


- Keith Ferrazzi, "Never Eat Alone"

description:
This group is for everybody who is passionate about TED and seeking inspiration as well as a community of open-minded people. 

What is TED?

TED is a nonprofit devoted to Ideas Worth Spreading. TED believes passionately in the power of ideas to change attitudes, lives and ultimately, the world. They have built an network that offers free knowledge and inspiration from the world’s most inspired thinkers, and also a community of curious souls to engage with ideas and each other. Along with two annual conferences in the US and UK, TED includes the award-winning TEDTalks video site, the annual TED Prize and hundreds of TEDx Events around the globe.

What is TEDx?

TEDx is where not only ideas spread, but TED as a conference that brings together bright and passionate people. The program is designed to give communities, organizations and individuals the opportunity to stimulate dialogue through TED-like experiences at the local level. TEDx events are organised independently, on a community-by-community basis. TEDx events are combination of live talks and screenings of TEDTalks. In March 2011 alone, 116 TEDx Events took place in 36 countries on all continents.

What is TEDxZurich?

TEDxZurich is a day of wonder, inspiration and awe. You will meet and get to know interesting people and learn about topics you never thought about before. The event is a series of short talks, ranging from about five to eighteen minutes length. In between speakers you will listen to amazing music and eat some great food.
name: TEDxZurich

description: This group is for International, English-speaking Ham Radio Enthusiasts in the Greater Zürich area who are looking to meet up with each other to share in the excitements of the Ham Radio hobby. All are welcome, both Swiss and non Swiss alike, topics can include Dxing, SDR, Elmering, Antennas, digital modes, problem solving, ham radio in CH, perhaps even Dxpeditioning! Plus opportunity to get out for a bit some cheap eats/drinks in the process!

description: Learn a method of meditation so simple a child of 5 or a 100 year old can do it. New members will be taught how to meditate and should be willing to sit still in meditation for at least 1/2 hour during our Meetup! All meetings are free of charge!

description:
This group is organised by Josefina and Luzius from Argentina respectively Switzerland and is open to everyone who is interested in sustainable and DIY-textiles. It offers dyeing, knitting, crocheting and sewing workshops, but also discussion forums, DIY-meetings or speeches on the subject.

About us:
In 2011 we launched our project Anna & Juan dedicated to developing sustainable textiles based on the use of plant dyes. We also cultivate dyeing plants in a garden close to the lake of Hallwil in Switzerland.

The aim is not only to rediscover traditional textile techniques but also to apply them in a new and fashionable way. The project’s intention is to design responsibly, increase longevity of textiles, strengthen awareness and build community. We are interested in working in collaboration with companies and people with related goals.

Find out more about Anna & Juan on www.annajuan.ch or stay connected through Facebook page: www.facebook.com/AnnaundJuan.
name: Sustainable Textiles & Natural Dyes

description:
This Meetup is about learning about options trading, how to use probabilities and volatility to gain an edge.

Anybody interested in options trading is welcome to join and contribute to the success of the group.

Selling premium gives ourselves the best opportunity for success. From a price direction perspective, when selling premium we can win in three scenarios: if the stock price stays the same, moves against us slightly or moves in our favor. When buying premium however, we can only win in one scenario, and that is if the stock price moves in our favor fast enough. Bringing IV into the equation opens up another dimension in which we can profit. In low IV environments we may look to buy premium and hope for an IV expansion, and in high IV environments we look to sell premium in anticipation of a contraction in IV.
name: Zürich Options Trading - Tastytrade

description:
Liebe Meet-Up Freunde für unser Kunst und Kultur Projekt Switzers, www.switzers.ch, suchen wir Menschen aus dem Ausland die in der Schweiz leben. In der Schweiz leben zur Zeit 195 verschiedene Nationen. Wir möchten in Form von Foto Portraits die Vielfältigkeit der Schweiz zeigen, mit einer gigantischen Open-Air Ausstellung der Porträts im und um den Hauptbahnhof Zürich. Wir haben bereits 100 Menschen aus 100 Nationen gefunden und sind nun auf der Suche nach den übrigen 95 Nationen. Wenn Du wissen willst welche Nationen wir noch suchen, schau Dir unser Video auf Facebook an www.facebook.com/switzers.ch Ist Dein Land aufgeführt, dann setze Dich mit uns in Verbindung.


Dear Meet-up Friends

For our Cultural Art Project Switzers www.switzers.ch we are looking for people from foreign countries living in Switzerland for a Photo Portrait. Today 195 different Nations are living together in Switzerland. We want to show Switzerland's diversity with a big open-air exhibition of all the different portraits, in the heart of Zurich.  

Up to now we have already found 100 contributing People form 100 different Nations but we are still seeking the other 95 Nations living in Switzerland. If you want to know if your country is one of those we are still looking for, check our FB Video on www.facebook.com/switzers.ch 

If your find your country on the list we would be more then happy if you could get in touch with us.
name: Switzers

description: Per tutti coloro a cui piace la condivisione: perché insieme è più divertente! Qui si può parlare proprio di tutto o stare in silenzio in meditazione. Per chi cerca, sta cercando, o ha già trovato la via di casa, quella che attraverso l'Amore Universale ci porta verso noi stessi. Di aiuto in questa ricerca sono le Asana dello Yoga, le Meditazioni guidate sui Chakra, le Meditazioni in Movimento del Qi Gong, la Disciplina del corpo attraverso le Arti Marziali, la Lettura e la condivisione di libri a tema, l'utilizzo di Materiali e Simboli, ma anche una tazza di buon tè, una passeggiata all'aria aperta, un sorriso... e soprattutto la Volontà di trovare e prendersi, fra le varie abitudini, un po' del proprio tempo per dedicarlo a se stessi, in mezzo agli altri.

Let's get together, meet new people and make new friends! If it's for drinking a coffee and talk, have a drink after work, try out something new, go shopping, do sport, enjoy warm summer nights by the lake, be in nature, a wellness day... Looking forward to meet you!

description: Do you thrive on meaningful conversation and connection? Would you like to join others in the Baden area at social gatherings that reach beyond the superficial, that embrace the range of deep and meaningful as well as fun and lighthearted? Baden Conversation Cafe will embrace an array of activities that we can enjoy doing together as well as discussions that allow us to connect meaningfully to ourselves and each other. Activities can include good food & conversation designed around specific topics, walks in nature where we allow ourselves to be touched, or going to art museums or performances and sharing our insights and reflections. This is also an opportunity to make friends that you can reach out to for an impromptu walk & talk or coffee/tea to simply connect with.

Insbesondere interessieren uns deren Implikationen auf unsere persönlichen Freiheiten, auf die Gesellschaft und deren demokratischen Rechte und Regeln, auf die wirtschaftliche Entwicklung in allen Sektoren generell und jene der Schweiz.

description:
Ikebana ist eine Form der Schulung, die Einblick in die Schönheit des Lebens gewährt.

Ikebana Schule Caroline Vögele-Ott

Dies ist eine Gruppe für alle die sich gerne mit Blumen, natürlichem Pflanzenmaterial und schönen Gefässen beschäftigen und eine sinnliche Beziehung zur Natur pflegen. Ob Anfänger oder Fortgeschritten, alle sind willkommen, entweder meine Anfängerkurse zu besuchen oder in der Erfahrungsgruppe mitzumachen. Ich habe diese Gruppe gestartet, um Ikebana allen Interessierten ohne Vorkenntnisse zugänglich zu machen und die bereits erfahrenen IkebanistiInnen zum Austausch und gemeinsamen Experimentieren zu ermuntern. Ich freue mich auf viel sinnliche, blumige und kreative Meetings und kleine Erleuchtungsmomente für Anfänger.

Ich selber nehem regelmässig an verschiedenen internationalen Workshops teil und bilde mich immer weiter. Wer einmal erlebt hat wie wertvoll dieses schaffen mit Blumen und Zweigen ist, kann für den Rest seines Lebens nicht mehr davon ablassen. So ist es mir gegangen, als ich vor über 12 Jahren angefangen habe. Es wird Teil des Alltags. Die Betrachtung und die Wahrnehmung der Natur wird zu einem bereichernden Erlebnis. Der Wunsch nach Ordnung im eigenen Wohnraum ist eine Nebenerscheinung die Ikebana ganz unbemerkt fördert und entstehen lässt. Für mich ist Ikebana auch eine Form von "urban Gardening". Sie bringt einen Ausschnitt der Natrur in Deinen Wohnraum und verzaubert ihn jedes Mal von neuem! 

Bitte finde auf folgendem Link noch ausführlichere Informationen zu meiner Schule:

http://www.caroline-voegele.ch/index.php?id...

Herzlichst

Caroline
name: Zürich Ohara Ikebana, the art of japanese flower arrangement

description: Hey there, I just founded a group on facebook called "New in town - the parents connection". New in town is a group which helps families, who just moved to the canton Zurich in Switzerland, to get in contact with moms or dads who are in the same situation. Are you looking for other moms or dads from your country or foreign countries to have playdates with the kids instead of being on your own while your husband or wife is working? Or are you maybe looking for babysitter-co-ops? Then welcome to "New in town". Post what you wish for and try to find other moms and dads who have the same desires. In order to make this group work it is important to play by the rules with the following guidelines: Please write where in Zurich you are looking for other parents: Zurich north, west, south or east and in which cities, age of your kids, where you are from, your nationality and what you are looking for. You have also the possibility to make own suggestions to meet the other families. Please post in the following languages so that I am able to understand the content: german, english, french, spanish or italian. I am looking forward to meeting you. I hope you will find what you are looking for.

We discuss technical, legal, finance and economic topics that are related to Ethereum, and cryptocurrencies 2.0 in general. We will also focus on business applications that might be attractive to implement on the Ethereum network. Everyone is welcome: programmers, economists, finance professionals, lawyers... Join us :)

Main site: https://www.ethereum.org

Developer site: https://ethdev.com/

Whitepaper: http://ethereum.org/ethereum.html

description: „Gott kann man nicht im materiellen Körper finden, aber wenn man es könnte, dann würde man ihn im Herzen finden.“ (Aba Aziz Makaja) Wir treffen uns jeweils Mittwoch Abend für Yoga und Meditation. Wir praktizieren gemeinsam einfache Hatha-Yoga Übungen mit einer anschließenden, geführten Komaja-Meditation. Danach besteht die Möglichkeit zum Austausch. Die grundlegende Technik der Komaja Meditation ist eine kombinierte Saguna- und Nirguna-Meditation. Im ersten Teil wählt der Meditierende eine Person des anderen Geschlechts aus, z.B. den Liebespartner, eine unbekannte Person oder einen Heiligen. Wesentlich ist, dass diese Person in ihm ein Gefühl der Liebe, Vergötterung, Bewunderung, Ekstase, Freude, Hingabe usw. erweckt. Man fühlt ein starkes Strahlen aus der Brust und das Strömen der Lebensenergie durch den ganzen Körper. Im zweiten Teil der Meditation bemüht sich der Meditierende, den Geist frei von jeglichem Inhalt zu machen. Er beobachtet alle Impulse, die aus dem inneren und der Umgebung kommen, ohne jedoch darauf zu reagieren oder darüber nachzudenken. Sein Bewusstsein bleibt rein wie ein Spiegel. Im zweiten Teil verweilen wir also in Bewusstheit, Wachheit, Geistesgegenwart, und dies in Abwesenheit jeglicher gedanklicher und emotionaler Aktivitäten.
name: Meggen Yoga and Meditation Meetup

Hinter dieser Meetup-Gruppe steckt das Projekt "Smart-up - Unterstützung für Start-ups" der Hochschule Luzern. Unsere Absicht ist es, auf interessante Events im Bereich Entrepreneurship, die in der Zentralschweiz stattfinden, hinzuweisen - unabhängig davon, von wem diese organisiert sind. Dies soll Anlässe aller Art umfassen - von Workshops und Gründerkursen über Podiumsgespräche und Networking-Anlässen bis hin zu Start-up-Wettbewerben, Investorenclubs und vieles mehr. 

Wir möchten sowohl potentielle und aktive Jungunternehmende als auch Expert/innen, Investor/innen, Coaches sowie ganz einfach an Entrepreneurship interessierte Leute vernetzen, zusammenbringen und voneinander profitieren lassen. Wir freuen uns über alle, die unserer Gruppe beitreten - und auf viele spannende Gelegenheiten, sich kennenzulernen und auszutauschen.

description:
Wir sind eine Gruppe von passionierten Software-Entwicklern / -Architekten. 

In unseren "Tagesjobs" bewegen wir uns mehrheitlich auf "traditionellen" Stacks. Wir interessieren uns für die diversen "neuen" Ansätze wie wir unsere Applikationen robust, skalierbar und trotzdem einfach einfach bauen können. Hier haben wir jedoch noch wenig oder keine Erfahrung, respektive Wissen. 

Buzzwords für Konzepte in diesem Bereich sind "reactive", "parallel", "concurrent", "distributed", "event driven", "async", "actors", "STM", ... Die entsprechenden Libraries / Frameworks heissen RxJava, Hysterix, AKKA, Vert.x, gpars, Hazelcast, Infinispan... Wir bewegen uns mit unterschiedlichen Programmiersprachen (Java, Scala, Groovy, ...), aber immer auf der Java Plattform. 

Ca. einmal pro Monat kommen wir zusammen und tauschen uns aus. 

Dabei 

• coden wir zusammen und "probieren Zeugs aus"

• und/oder schauen uns eine Präsentation an 

• und/oder stellen uns etwas gegenseitig vor 

• und/oder trinken einfach ein Bier oder ne Cola und diskutieren 

Wir treffen uns in ungezwungener Atmosphäre, von Entwickler zu Entwickler, zum gemeinsamen "Lernen" und "Weiterkommen".
name: Luzern reactive/concurrent/distributed solutions on the JVM

description: Welcome! This group is for all current or future guitar players that like to have fun with the instrument and would like to know more about getting better. Es sollen jedoch trotzdem technologie bezogene Themen behandelt werden. Es wäre schön, wenn sich Entwickler aus allen Programmiersprachen, sei es Java, C#, C, C++, F#, Delphi, Pearl, Pascal, Cobol oder bekannte Web Script Sprachen wie AngularJS, NodeJS, etc. treffen, um gemeinsam Erfahrungen auszutauschen.

description:
Liebe Freunde. Ich möchte euch gern zu einem speziellen Anlass einladen. Es soll einen Abend im Monat für Gleichgesinnte geben. An dem Tag, können sich die Menschen begegnen, Kontakte knüpfen und einfach austauschen. Ich werde es organisieren und führen, aber jeder darf seins dazu beitragen. So schöpfen wir gegenseitig. Die Idee ist entstanden durch Klientinnen und Klienten, die ich ins Herz geschlossen habe und wie ich finde, es wird Zeit sich miteinander zu verbinden. Viele entwickeln sich allein für sich, ohne Gleichgesinnte zu kennen. Somit ist es eine Möglichkeit, aber natürlich auch für die, die denken einmal mit anderen zu meditieren, wäre eine Erfahrung wert.


So plane ich mal vor, obwohl ich flexibel bin und wir gemeinsam einen Raum und Zeit festlegen können. 


Was ich möchte ist Entwicklung. Was ich schätze ist Respekt vor dem eigenen und vor dem anderen. Was ich beitrage ist meine Liebe zur Natur, zu der auch die Menschen zählen. So veranstalten wir einen Abend, wo wir frei sind und nichts müssen. Es soll für alle hilfreich sein und den momentanen Zustand entsprechend fördern.


Wir unterstützen uns gegenseitig, damit jeder weiss, man ist nicht allein auch in beschissenster Lage, kann ich mich an jemanden wenden.


Wenn jemand Interesse hat und eine Idee oder Vorschlag, dann los, schreib mir: natalieperri@gmx.ch


Ich freue mich auf Euch

latayacenter.com
name: Lataya Center

description: Ich bin eine leidenschaftliche Hobbyköchin, liebe es, Leute einzuladen und möchte auf diese Weise für mich und meine Single-Freundinnen (attraktiv, sportlich, gebildet und beruflich erfolgreich, Mitte 40, keine Kinder und eher gross (zwischen 1,71 und 1,76m) ungezwungen, im privaten und persönlichen Rahmen männliche Singles kennenzulernen, nach dem Motto: Alles kann, nichts muss. description:
Eingeladen sind alle, die einfach nur hier und da zusammen mit paar Leuten bei dem ein oder anderen Glas Bier oder Wein 'socializen' wollen. Selbstverständlich auch jene die im schönen Zürich als Deutsche nicht immer ganz auf ihre 'sozialen' Kosten kommen:) Im Sommer mit Grill, Spiel und Spass im Park - bei schlechtem Wetter in Restaurants, Kneipen, Bars und Tanzschuppen. Ob Männlein oder Weiblein ist egal - idealerweise ist ne gewisse Affinität zu sozialen Aktivitäten vorhanden;) 

If you don't speak German - do not despair. You can still team up with us -  for instance in out-going and game playing activities up to the point where language becomes irrelevant. You can also just come and try to pick up German from those who mastered it in a life long journey through Biergarten's, Fussballabenden and 'Abhängen im Park'. Alternatively, give it a shot with English - chances are we either speak it or have a loose tongue already due to previous beer/wine/tea consumption.

description:
We participate from beginning of May through to the end of September on 5 Ynglings which are shared by the boat sharing organisation "Sailcom" (sailcom.ch) at the regatta training on Tuesday evenings which is organised by the "Zürcher Segelclub". We meet at 18 o'clock in Hafen ("harbour") Enge. No regatta knowledge is needed. If you want to participate, sign in at scrg.ch and write yourself in at http://scrg.ch/regattatraining/anmeldung/di. Participation costs 15 francs and has to be payed at the spot. Further information in german you find on scrg.ch.

Wir segeln von Anfang Mai bis Ende September auf den 5 Ynglingen der Boatsharing-Organisation "Sailcom" (sailcom.ch) am Regattatraining vom Zürcher Segelclub mit. Wir treffen uns jeweils am Dienstagabend um 18 Uhr im Hafen Enge und regattieren anschliessend auf einem Linearkurs zwischen Zürichhorn und Wollishofen. Das Training ist offen für jedermann bzw. -frau, jedoch muss mindestens ein Sailcom-Mitglied an Bord sein. Weitere Infos und Anmeldung: scrg.ch

description: Founded in 1957, the American Club of Zurich (ACZ) is open to all American and Canadian citizens, as well as others having association with either the USA or Canada, seeking friends and contacts within the Zurich community. The ACZ is a Member of the Association of American Clubs (AAC). The ACZ helps you to make a smooth transition and integration into the community. In addition, the club, through its volunteers, organizes events that enable you to fully benefit from and enrich your experience over the years in your host country, our beautiful Switzerland. In the process our members establish a camaraderie and spirit of fun as they profit from creative ideas of both new and more established members. The purpose of the ACZ is to promote ‘Fellowship, Friendship, and Service’ while bringing English-speaking people of all nations together. The club provides a platform for its members who are principally Americans and Canadians, complemented by Associate Members from many nations around the world. We look forward to meeting you soon!

description: We are a local community verein/touch club in the Zurich region, Switzerland. Our club was formed in 2014 on the founding ideas of inclusion and of involvement with the local community. Our sport is relatively new in Switzerland and not yet widely played by native Swiss people. We plan to change that, as we believe our fantastic sport should be shared by all. We aim to spread the word and build a vibrant community club one touch game at a time and have more people of all ages playing more touch, more often. For families, single adults, expats, locals, students - anyone looking to play a great sport, make friends and have fun doing it - this is the group for you!

description:
WHAT IS "BOOTY BOOT-CAMP? Free 1 hour outdoor fitness sessions. (Donations are more than welcome & much appreciated) 

- High intensity interval training: burn fat, build muscle! 

- Focused on Abs, legs & of course BOOTY! 

- Fun and always different. FOR WHO? - Everyone : ALL fitness levels welcome! 

WHERE & WHEN? 

**Always outside (there will be no boot-camp on rainy days) 

**Default meeting point is: In der Brunnmatt 1, 8103 Unterengstringen. 

from there we will walk/run/jog to different near by locations.

 **Saturdays and Sundays - Flexible times, depending on how many people want to come and when.

 HOW CAN I JOIN? 

1. Call or text +41 (0) 76 802 4401.

 2. "Hi Lona, I want to do a boot camp with you on Sunday Morning." 

3. Awesome! - I will ask you some questions about your fitness level, injuries, what kinds of exercises you like and don't like etc. If I don't know you're coming - I can't customize the boot-camp. That's it! 

**PLEASE ALWAYS CALL BEFORE HAND! **BITTE IMMER ZU ERST ANRUFEN! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 

I am a fitness enthusiast - I love to be outside and I training with other people. I decided to start this page because I am new in Switzerland and I hope to use these boot-camps as a fun, productive way to meet new people and share my passion for running around outside. I very much enjoy teaching people about fitness and being there to motivate someone to push their limits and achieve their goals. 

You have nothing to loose by coming out, because participation is donation based, and you can stop at any point during the training. I encourage you to take everything at your own pace - it's not about being better than anyone else, it's about being the best you can be. 

I am NOT a certified fitness trainer or health practitioner. Fitness is a hobby and all my knowledge is based on my own personal research and experience. I am happy to share with you what I know, but I wont have the answer for everything. I also cannot take responsibility for your safety - Participation should be challenging but most of all FUN, so if you experience pain, dizziness or sickness at any point PLEASE STOP right away (and preferably let me know before it gets to this point!).
name: Free Summer Fitness Boot-Camps

description:
This is a platform for all who are interested in discovering the Inner Joy and Peace, in developing a healthy perspective toward the Self and the world, in expanding consciousness, or simply to relief stresses we face daily. 

The Ancient Teaching of Ascension, as taught by the Ishayas, can be practiced not only as a meditation but also with the eyes open in the hustle and bustle of daily activities. Praise, Gratitude and Love naturally expands from inside out. No belief is required for it to work...no mantra, no effort, no control. It is THAT simple and incredibly effective. 

We provide Free Introductory Talks for those interested in the Ishayas' Ascension and how it can help you. We also offer Meditation Workshops (The First Sphere) for those choosing to learn the Ascension Techniques. 

For the most current events offered worldwide, visit www.ishayasworldwide.com. 

Teachers of Ascension travel around the world to teach. Click here to find out how to create a course in your local area. 

We also invite you to view these resources: 

Was ist Ascension?

Eine Einführung in Ascension 

Testimonials und erstellen Sie einen Kurs in Ihrer Nähe

The Ascension techniques are taught in the First Sphere setting. Those who have learned the basic four Ascension techniques (aka Ascenders) are then encouraged to schedule your own Meetups to meditate together on a regular basis. You may also request teachers to be present at any time. These events, called Ascenders Meetings, are free of charge.
name: Learn to Meditate - Zürich

description:
This is a group for enthusiasts of the Merkle Web and Smart Contract technology. We are concerned with the following thought experiments:

A. What if all users and machines across the globe could put all of their data (identity information, social network data, video and audio content, geospatial information, sensor data etc.) into a single unified data structure maintained in a completely distributed fashion?

B. Is it conceivable users could own all of their data and not need to cede control to centralized organizations?

C. Is the future one where Web services like Facebook focus not on gathering and storing user data but on providing a user interface and methods for fetching information a user needs?

D. How will Smart Contracts impact the next generation of content distribution, provide monetization models for the Merkle Web, and empower new financial services?

The technological backbone to enable all of the above is being built concurrently by many projects. We were inspired by the Eris and IPFS projects to start this group, but aim to develop a broad understanding of possibilities.

Please join us to spot and develop commercial opportunities by building: 

1. The future of blockchain technology and the financial services industry

2. The future of content distribution

3. The future of social networking

We will host talks from the visionary pioneers of this technological wild west to build our understanding and skate to where the puck is going to be!
name: Merkle Web & Smart Contracts meetup Zurich

description:
WooCommerce has emerged as the most popular method to sell online with close to 600K sites powered by WordPress and WooCommerce and over 6 million downloads. Our success has always been hinged to the amazing WordPress & WooCommerce communities.

We would love to grow our community and integrate like-minded people to talk and help each other out with everything Woo-related. Are you a avid WooCommerce enthusiast and wanting to be a part of a community of passionate developers, store owners and ecommerce specialists? We’d love you to get involved in organising our WooCommerce meetups all over the globe.

Meetups are meant to benefit the local WooCommerce community through live events and the broader WordPress community through the sharing of knowledge.

In the past year we’ve crept more and more out of our cyber shell and attended an increasing amount of WordPress events and ecommerce events. The response to all things WooCommerce has been tremendous but the need users have for collaboration and assistance is abundant. We recognize that their are limitations to what we can do for our users on WooThemes.com and thus want to create space for users (developers and store owners) to connect, help one another and see what emerges. Simply put, amazing things happen when people come together.

---

Meetups are a casual, locally- and volunteer-organized event, sometimes with the sponsorship aid of WooThemes employees, focused on WooCommerce and reflecting the local community it represents. Meetups are non-profit events, organized with budget and funding transparency.
name: Zürich WooCommerce Meetup

description:

Our aim is to bring psychoanalysis out of the consulting room and to provide individuals from all walks of life with an opportunity to engage with the exploratory energy of depth psychology. The purpose of POTS is not to popularize psychoanalysis but rather to share, embody and enact its exploratory ethos. To dream it forward by means of addressing, and being addressed by, audiences from all walks of life in diverse non-clinical, non-institutional settings. Stillpoint Spaces is also a online community for people of search for purpose and meaning in their life:. http://www.stillpointspaces.com

The initiative is co-produced together with Swiss-based think-tank The Zurich Lab[oratory]. http://www.zurichlab.org http://www.stillpointzurich.com

description:
“Camino de Santiago/Way of St. James/ Jakobsweg” is a very old pilgrimage in Spain (6 weeks and 900 kilometres to complete), which millions of people, all over the world have completed since the Middle Ages. Its outstanding history and trail infrastructure are unique in the world and together create an unparalleled “bonding and trust” between travelling companions. Some people are inspired by an interest in culture, others from spiritual conviction, yet others love the chance of adventure, or approach it as a personal challenge… but whatever your reason, “Camino de Santiago/Way of St. James/ Jakobsweg)” offers a life-changing experience provided in a way only Northern Spain can offer. 

My proposal is to plan, prepare and personally lead walking trips with Meetup friends on the “Camino de Santiago/Way of St. James/ Jakobsweg)” in Northern Spain: 

• Let me know your availability (preferred timing for travelling) and your requested trip duration (1 week minimum, 10 days, 2 weeks, etc.) and I will organize travelling groups of minimum 5 people to “Camino de Santiago/Way of St. James/ Jakobsweg)” in Northern Spain. Daily walking schedule: 7 am – 2/3pm. 

• Price per person: CHF 300 per walking day. 

• Included in the price: 

        + Accommodation

        + Three Meals (breakfast, lunch and dinner)

        + Guide accompanying the group at all times

        + Private transport of backpacks (when required)

        + Camino de Santiago Accreditation

        + Daily massages

        + Entry ticket to Guggenheim Museum in Bilbao

        + Help with travelling arrangements

        + Preparation for the trip with several walks in Zurich

•  Not included in the price:

        + Cost of travelling (international flights and local transport)

        + Personal travelling insurance

• Health and Safety:

        + One hour away from nearest hospital (at all times)

        + Taxis available (at all times)

        + Individual travelling insurance to be organized by each participant 

        + Group guide accompanying the group (at all times)

 • Personal benefits: 

        + "Life-changing" experience

        + Weight loss

        + Physical fitness

        + Psychological relaxation

        + Improved well-being 

• Links of interest: 

+ “Camino de Santiago” (Way of St. James)” website: http://www.spain.info/en/que-quieres/rutas/grandes-rutas/...

+ YouTube link to a Hollywood movie trailer: The Way, starring Martin Sheen & Emilio Estevez: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tzFV1Ixof0Q

+ YouTube video about the Way of St. James experience: https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&...
name: Camino de Santiago/Way of St.James/Jakobsweg for All

description:
Online Trading is 1% Technical and 99% Psychological. Most of the traders fail in the psychological part. One has to be like a Robot or Machine without emotions to earn in Online Trading which is nearly impossible. Learn how to achieve success in emotional management and gain success in Online Trading. 

The program is suitable to all traders in stocks, commodity and forex.  

You will be learning about mistakes that most of the traders around the world do. You will learn about mistakes your mind your forces to do.  You will learn how your experience misleads you.

After the program, our participants start focusing more on emotional management and strategies and less on fundamentals.

description:
Synergy Village is a place of inspiration where international and local people meet to be creative, try new things and learn from each other. The idea is to create a platform where people can be creative in a laid back atmosphere, without expectations and pressure. People can try new things and develop hidden talents.

Everyone is welcome to be part of it. You don't need to consider yourself as an artist or a creative person. It's for everyone who is just open to try new things and discover new sides in oneself.

description:
The 'Independent Asset Management Hub' meet-up aims to regularily bring various senior representatives of stake-holders with an interest in the Independent AM industry together. This is more relevant than ever given the various challenges independent asset managers face today with increasing regulatory and process related complexity, margin pressure and changing investor demand. At the same time, these challenges also offer opportunities for those who are willing to adapt when necessary and for new entrants in the market. The 'IAM Hub' is an optimal and truly independent and privately organized network to stay up to date with the ongoing developments.

Welcome are senior representatives of independent Asset Managers (of course) and financial intermediaries, Service Providers, FinTechs with a focus on asset and wealth management, SROs, etc.

The launch meet-up took place on 22 September 2015 in Zurich, hope you join us to benefit and to contribute at future events. Do not hesitate to invite your friends to become part of this meet-up group :-)
name: Independent Asset Management Hub

description: This is a group for anyone interested in Green Smoothies, vegan and vegetarian nutrition and health in general. You don't need to be vegan/vegetarian to be a part of this group, join us to learn how to introduce new foods in your diet! The creator of this meetup is Yolanda Pascual, aka Jolly Yoli, is a Nutrition Science student, specializing in vegetarian and vegan nutrition. Being a vegetarian/vegan herself, she became interested in nutrition to finally dedicate her life to it. Thanks to green smoothies she found a way to keep herself on the right track to get all the nutrients she needed for optimal living. In consequence, she started sharing her experience with friends and family, which turned into a Facebook community where she now shares her recipes and insights on a daily basis. As for now, more than 6500+ followers are being inspired by her creations, nutrition information and articles about health and humour every day. Conducting workshops in Tenerife, La Gomera, Barcelona, Madrid, Valencia, Castellón and Berlin Jolly Yoli was able to share her passion for green smoothies with other people. Do you want to be a part of this journey? :)
name: Zürich Green Smoothies Meetup

description:
Diese Gruppe habe ich für Radfahrer-Enthusiasten gegründet, die an Rennrad-Touren, Rennrad-Trainings, MTB und Trekkingbike-Touren in der Schweiz Interesse haben. Abstecher ins nahe Ausland können vorkommen.  Verschiedene Leistungsstufen sind vorgesehen, für einfache lockere, sportliche und anspruchsvolle Bedürfnisse. Sie soll Rennrad- Trekkingbike- und MTB-Fahrer die Gelegenheit bieten, mit Gleichgesinnten auf mehrheitlich verkehrsarmen Strecken ihr Hobby zu geniessen, ohne eigene Routenplanung und -Navigation. Bei MTB-Touren handelt es sich um technisch einfach zu befahrene Routen. Das Angebot ist je nach Art und Umfang der Dienstleistung gratis oder kostenpflichtig. Entsprechend weise ich jeweils bei der Ausschreibung darauf hin.

Aus langjähriger persönlicher Erfahrung und Leidenschaft für das Thema Radfahren möchte ich dazu beitragen, dass mehr Menschen mit dem Fahrrad unterwegs sind.

Wegen meines früheren beruflichen und radsportlichen Hintergrunds kann ich optimal für Interessierte gegen Gebühr passende Routen entwickeln, z. B. von Trainingsrunden über halb- und ganztägige Touren bis hin zu mehrtägigen. Ich biete ausserdem begleitete private Touren und Trainings an.

Noch ein Grund, warum ich Heidi Bike ins Leben rufe: Vor genau 10 Jahren, am 21. Juni 2005, sind wir zu dritt in Inuvik zu einem 2-jährigen Radabenteuer von Kanada nach Argentinien gestartet. Dieses Jubiläum nehme ich zum Anlass.

Es wird offiziell in hochdeutsch kommuniziert. Teilnehmer mit anderer Muttersprache sind willkommen und haben Gelegenheit, ihre Deutschkenntnisse zu vertiefen. Mit der englischen Sprache kommt ihr bei Heidi Bike auch zurecht :-)

Ich freue mich auf tolle Runden mit Euch.

Weitere Informationen folgen, und auch schon bald die erste Tour.
name: Heidi Bike  Touren/Trainings für Rennrad, Trekkingbike, MTB

description:
(german translation see below)

Enjoy music so intimate like you will never expirience at a regular concert!

You have the chance to explore new music from talented street musicans with the atmosphere like it was in your own living room.

The Living Room Concerts are for everyone, wo loves good music real music. It's for music lovers, who like guitar music. And it is for people, who love to connect and have a great time with new people. We have people from different nations.

This is the timetable:

• Befour every concert, we always do some putlock dinner, so everyone brings some food and drinks to share. When it is not raining, we will also have a grill for barbecue.

• You enjoy the Living Room Concert on a couch, chair or somewhere in between

• After the concert, you'll have the time to continue sharing stories with other attendees


Our Slogan: Grow your social circle and have a great time together


We are thrilled to meet you guys :-)

-----

Geniesse Musik, die du sonst nirgendswo in so einer Atmosphäre hast!

Du hast die Möglichkeit, neue Musik von talentierten Strassenmusikern zu geniessen und das mit der Atmosphäre, als wäre es dein Wohnzimmer.

Die Wohnzimmerkonzerte sind für jeden, der gute echte Musik liebt. Für Musikliebhaber, die Gitarrenmusik mögen. Und es ist für Leute die es lieben, neue Kontakte zu knüpfen, um zusammen eine gute Zeit zu haben. Wir haben Leute von verschiedenen Nationen.

Das ist der Ablauf:

• Vor jedem Konzert machen wir ein "putlock dinner". Das heisst, jeder bringt etwas mit zum essen und trinken um mit anderen zu teilen

• Du geniesst das Wohnzimmerkonzert auf einer Couch, Sessel oder sonstwo dazwischen

• Nach dem Konzert hast du nochmals Zeit, um noch länger mit den anwesenden Gästen zu reden


Unser Motto: Erweitere deinen Bekanntenkreis und geniesse das Zusammensein


Wir freuen uns, euch kennenzulernen :-)

description:
In dieser Gruppe geht es um den Weg und die Werte des Herzens. Wir treffen uns regelmässig zu den verschiedensten Aktivitäten, welche sich dahingehend ausrichten, dass wir in kollektiver Verbundenheit die Neugier für das Mysterium Leben teilen und (Eigen-)Liebe finden, um unseren eigenen Weg der Liebe zu finden und zu gehen.
Wertefrei und unbefangen treffen wir uns für gemeinsame Ausflüge, Singles-Treffen, Meditationen, Kochabende oder Veganer- / Rohkost-Potlucks, Redekreise & Kuschelabende, schamanische Arbeit (Schwitzhütten, Trommelkreise, indigene Medizin etc.), Kino und andere Events.
Wir zählen uns zu der Generation "Allrounder" und sind deshalb nicht in unserer Meinung festgefahren, sondern üben Offenheit und Toleranz, um die vielschichtigen Aspekte des Lebens zu erfahren und zu geniessen. Wir leben unsere Visionen aus dem Herzen.
Willkommen und bis bald auf einem unserer Treffen.

Dein Organisator Armin Rasmin

0041-79-883 98 29

• My Website

• Facebook

Möchtest du etwas organisieren, dann bring dich mit deinen Ideen ein und plane deine eigenen Treffen über diese Gruppe.

Something in English...:
This group is for everyone who wants to come together for finding their own way in life. We experience a variety of different styles of activities, all revolving around finding love, connecting to your higher self, enjoying life consciously and walking the talk of your life. Want to organise something? Then bring in your ideas and start own meetups through this group.

Save yourself the money for a dating service and come join us, instead, as we enjoy coffee/tea, brunch, lunch, dinner and everything in between! ;-) Enjoy a spot of dancing with us on a warm spring night or an evening of fun board games on a rainy fall night. Join us for a night at the Open Air Cinema in the summer or an open air cheese fondue in the winter. We're all about easy-going fun, laughter and having a good ol' time (which, by the way, doesn't mean that we don't also enjoy deep conversations about love, life and "the unbearable lightness of being" (because we do!))! :-D 

Willst du andere Singles treffen und / oder neue Freundschaften schliessen? Spar dir das Geld für einen Dating-Service und komm stattdessen mit uns mit einen Kaffee / Tee, Brunch, Mittagessen, Abendessen und alles dazwischen geniessen! ;-) Komm mit uns eine Runde tanzen an einem warmen Frühlingsabend oder hab' Spaß bei Gesellschaftsspielen an einem regnerischen Herbstabend. Begleite uns ins Open Air Kino im Sommer oder zum Open-Air Käse-Fondue im Winter. Wir lachen gerne, haben Spaß und geniessen gemeinsame Unternehmungen aller Art (was, nebenbei bemerkt, nicht bedeutet, dass wir nicht auch gerne tiefe Gespräche über die Liebe, das Leben und "die unerträgliche Leichtigkeit des Seins" führen (denn das tun wir!))!: -D

description:
How can a slight shift in the global leadership approach change our organisations, our economy, and our society. Forever.

The current global economic model focuses on a profit driven value based approach that relies on competition and causes significant consumption of global resources. the future global economic model focuses on a people driven values based approach that shifts to collaboration and results in shared consumption of global resources. the shift will be facilitated by a future oriented transition that bridges the current approach to the future model. all key elements of the current system will be retained while activating the full potential of the new human values based ecosystem.

Beyond Leadership is focusing all attention and resources on building the vehicle for the transition to the future model.

based on state of the art knowledge around human interaction and collaboration, beyond leadership is building the approach, methods, tools and instruments to facilitate a smooth transition between the current model and the future. Those cultures who best re-orient themselves to this future approach will have the largest impact on the fundamental shift in the global economy over the next 50 years.

the future has begun. a new era is dawning and those bold enough to embrace it will bring significant benefit to their economies and societies as a whole.

Lets go Beyond. Together.

WE EPITOMIZE THE POWER OF INTERACTION

We, the Beyonders, are people of any age and gender, from all walks of life, with a multitude of skills and life experiences. We will do everything to fulfil our mission for business and society.

A community of like-minded people

At the Beyond Academy, we learn from one another and enhance our personal skills. Through an intensive exchange, we continuously broaden and deepen our understanding of the Beyond approach and its tools, while strengthening our bond as a team. Since we have established closest bonds, we are able to achieve true excellence together: a new interaction climate in business and society. Due to our willingness to always give everything for one another and the personal commitment of each individual to our common purpose, we unfold the highest power of interaction for the benefit of companies and organizations.

OUR ENGAGEMENT

With lectures on the power of this new interaction quality, we inspire our audience as facilitators and key speakers at meetings and conferences.

With workshops on the “power of connecting“, we add significant value to companies and organizations, associations and institutions.

As lecturers at renowned universities, such as St. Gallen, Business School Mannheim and Goethe Universität in Frankfurt, as well as universities in Slovenia, Japan and Vietnam, we support management talents pro bono.

As Master Transition Agents, we are committed with our heart and soul to support companies and organizations that are ready to lift the quality of their relationships and thus their performance to highest levels.
name: changing the global economy. Forever - Schweiz

description:
To be truly happy in our daily life we need to be able to both equally well: first, to realize & share our happiness with others; and, second, to accept & maximize the happiness of others. 

Happiness Circle is an experimental meeting format designed to engage participants in a simple, yet effective, 30 min exercise and elevate their daily happiness. 

Minimum theory - maximum actual practice, as the entire meeting will be focused on you learning to share your happiness and to accept the happiness of others. 

In the end of the meeting, all participants get a summary of the method for practicing it at home with family, at work with colleagues, at after-work with friends, etc. 

Participation does not require any prior preparation - so even if you just want to switch off from daily routine - feel free to join in.

Happiness Circle Zurich is a part of the global self-organized network of Circles taking place in over 20 cities.

www.happinesscircle.org

description:
JAGUAR DRIVERS MEETUP

(English text below)

Diese “Meetup”-Gruppe versteht sich als kleinere Alternative zu den “offiziellen” Klubs für Fahrerinnen und Fahrer von Jaguars. Ganz ähnlich wie die grossen Klubs wollen wir gemeinsame Ausfahrten und andere Unternehmungen organisieren; dies jedoch mit deutlich weniger Teilnehmenden und mit jeweils besser auf die Interessen der Teilnehmenden abgestimmtem Programm. Grundsätzlich sind Fahrerinnen und Fahrer von Jaguars jeden Alters bzw. jeder Epoche willkommen.

Veranstaltungen finden in unregelmässigen Abständen statt; Termine werden (zumindest: auch) über Doodle abgestimmt, werden aber in aller Regel auf Samstage, Sonntage oder Feiertage fallen. Im Fokus der Aktivitäten stehen Tages-Ausfahrten, aber auch der Austausch über die Autos und andere Themen soll nicht zu kurz kommen. Die Strecken der Ausfahrten werden jeweils unter Berücksichtigung der teilnehmenden Autos ausgelegt (z.B. eher kurvenreiche Strecken für Sportwagen, eher “Auslauf”-Strecken für Limousinen usw.). Selbstverständlich werden jeweils Zwischenstopps in “standesgemässen” Lokalen vorgesehen ;-) Die Kosten (Benzin, Essen & Trinken usw.) werden in aller Regel individuell zu tragen sein.

Die Aufnahme neuer Mitglieder in die Gruppe erfolgt grundsätzlich nur auf Einladung hin bzw. nach einem vorherigen persönlichen Kontakt.


***************************


This group considers itself a smaller alternative to the “official” clubs for Jaguar and other British cars drivers. Quite like the big clubs, we organise joint rides and other events; however, the number of participants shall be smaller and the programmes will be better adjusted to meet the preferences and interests of the respective participants. In principle, drivers of all British cars of all ages are welcome.

Events will be organised on an irregular basis; times and dates will be coordinated (at least in part) via doodle but will, as a general rule, be on Saturdays, Sundays or holidays. Activities will focus on joint one-day rides; however, we shall not miss out on discussions and exchanges of experiences on our cars etc. Routes will be determined taking into account the type of cars participating (e.g. winding routes for sports cars, rather run-type routes for saloons). It goes without saying that rides will include stops at adequate venues ;-) As a general rule, the costs for gas, food & drinks, etc. will have to be borne by each participant individually.

New members are, in principle, only admitted by way of invitation and/or after prior personal contact.
name: Jaguar Drivers Meetup

description:
Was erwartet dich?

Malend mit dir in Kontakt zu kommen, dir auf die Spur zu kommen. Begleitetes Malen ist eine Möglichkeit in einem geschützten Raum frei von Vorstellungen Bilder auf dem Blatt entstehen zu lassen. Es gibt Zeit und Raum auf dem Blatt etwas entstehen zu lassen, ohne zu wissen was, ohne Absicht, ohne Interpretation. Das Spezielle an dieser Methode ist: das langsame Malen mit der Hand. Es dient dem achtsamen Malen, um im Moment zu bleiben, nicht abzuschweifen. Es ist eine Form von bewegter Meditation. 
In Kombination biete ich das Lösungsorientierte Malen an. Das Lösungsorientiere Malen ist hilfreich, wenn du ein spezifisches Anliegen hast. Symptome können mit dieser Methode sehr gut angegangen werden.

Diese Art zu malen unterstützt dich besser kennenzulernen - ohne das die anderen etwas davon mitbekommen müssen - malend neue Wege zu erproben, Belastendes zu verarbeiten. 


Interessiert?

Dann erwarten dich 1.5 Stunden begleitetes Malen in der Gruppe.


Vision

Kunsttherapie war für mich eine grossartige Entdeckung und diese möchte ich möglichst vielen zugänglich machen. Meine Idee ist, dass du auch die Möglichkeit hast zu lernen den Malprozess von jemand anderem zu begleiten. Beim Malen wie auch beim Begleiten üben wir Achtsamkeit.

description:
Willkommen beim Photography Meetup Baden!
Dieses Meetup richtet sich an alle, die sich für Fotografie interessieren und ihre Erfahrungen mit anderen austauschen möchten - vom Anfänger, über Fortgeschrittene bis hin zu Profis sind alle herzlich eingeladen. Geplant sind 1-2 Treffen pro Monat zu verschiedenen Themen, wie z.B. Landschaft, Makro, Portrait, blaue Stunde, Sternenhimmel, Architektur, Streetlife, HDR, Nachbearbeitung, usw.
Vorschläge aus der Gruppe für neue Treffen und Themen sind natürlich immer willkommen. Je nach Thema kann eine kleine Organisationsgebühr von 5-10 CHF anfallen, um die Kosten zu decken, kommerzielle Angebote sind allerdings unerwünscht.
Interesse? Dann einfach zum nächsten Termin anmelden, ich freue mich auf euch!

Welcome to Photography Meetup Baden!
This meetup is aimed to all who are interested in photography, want to learn more and are willing to share their experience with others. Everyone is welcome wheter you are beginner, advanced or pro.
I aim to organise one or two meetups per month on different topics, e.g. landscape, macro, portrait, blue hour, starry sky, architecture, streetlife, HDR, post-processing and so on.
Proposals from group members are of couse always welcome. Depending on the topic there might be a small organisational fee of 5-10 CHF for cost-covering. Commercial offers are unwanted.
Interested? Apply for the next Meetup! Hope to see you soon!

description:
Art, music, writing, photography, creativity in general

You’ve always wanted to paint or write, but haven’t known how to go about it?

You’re onto a creative project and don’t know how to finish it?

This meetup will help you get started, support you with your own creative project and teach you about creativity in general in a safe and caring environment. 

We will look at our unique way of expressing ourselves, what keeps us from doing so and tap into sources of inspiration. During the planned activities and courses you will immerse yourself in creativity, regardless of whether you’re already artistically active or a newcomer, and I will provide practical and technical advice as well as emotional support.

description:
Willst du dein eigenes Business starten oder bist bereits selbständig? Bist du neugierig auf das Thema "Frauen & Business"? "Wie bring ich das Alles unter einen Hut?"

Bist du neugierig auf weibliche Power und auf ein interessantes Netzwerk? Wir treffen uns in entspannter Atmosphäre, um zu lernen, Erfahrungen auszutauschen, neue Kontakte zu knüpfen, sich inspirieren zu lassen und eine Inspiration für andere Frauen zu sein.

Es ist an der an Zeit, unsere weibliche Intelligenz ins Business einfliessen zu lassen. Der Zeitgeist von "Neuem Unternehmertum" ist da. Die alten Systeme fallen auseinander, viele Menschen machen sich selbständig, aus der Not heraus oder weil das Alte nicht mehr passt.
Frauen wollen auch mit auf das Spielfeld von Geld und Innovation und es gibt eine Menge zu lernen.

We would like you to share your efforts, experiences, stories of success so that other members may learn from them. We can discuss job-related topics like focus, time-management, daily routine, procrastination, self-discipline, self-confidence, job-hunting strategies, how to deal with shame, failures, refusals and when you are feeling low. We discuss how we can concentrate on what we can do about the challenges and have a positive, optimistic attitude towards the future. We are here to help and motivate each other and to feel we are not alone in this situation.

description:
Benefiit, home based in Zürich, is a not-for-profit association and investment club, which focuses in making impact investments accessible for its members. 

What are impact investments? it refers to investments "made into companies, organizations, and funds with the intention to generate a measurable, beneficial social or environmental impact alongside a financial return".

Usually, access to impact investment is limited to affluent investors, such as family offices and private equities. As an individual, it is not easy to find good deals, due diligence is expensive and normally investment minimum required amount is way beyond an individuals budget. But as a group, we can reach the economy of scale, benefit from others expertise and have much better deal negotiation power to make good investments.  

Benefiit has been around already since 2010 To learn more, see our website: http://www.benefiit.com/. Its existing members are excited by the untapped opportunities for social impact and profit inherent in this field but are also aware of and capable of absorbing the risks involved. 

Please note what we are not:
- we are not a financial service provider nor linked to any
- we do not sell financial products

NOTE: We are currently running this Meetup Group in the BETA version to assess interest of people, which will determine the future course of this group. As we grow bigger, we will further expand the services by partnering to other great Meetup Groups, Investment Clubs and Networks.
name: Benefiit - Zürich Impact Investment Network
