description:
How would you like to tell your stories with illustrations of your own?
No matter if your story is sad or funny, thrilling or inspirational, short or long, nor if your drawing style is stick-man, talking heads/ animals or cartoons; you are welcome to meet me up and other like-minded people for a fun gathering.

I, Jess, a graphic novel graduate believe anyone can produce comics with nothing but a good story and supports from friends :)

You can share your doodles from the train rides, lunch breaks or dreams etc. I will also suggest a topic for us to do a short comic strip from, i.e. A Story of A Single Banana, as we share a coffee or tea.

We too will recommend and discuss great graphic novels, graphic novelists, comic artists, movies made from comics and, of course, visually-intriguing books we can illustrate :)

Meetups are usually held in Bern, Zurich, Baden or nearby areas on weekday afternoons.
All you need is a tiny piece of paper and a tool to draw and write with.

Look forward to be making new friends, best regards, Jess!

Here we bring together people from businesses to profit from technology, as well as people from technology to solve real world problems. Topics are ranging from Business English courses, to running business over crowdfunding to OpenSource, Linux, Hosting, Virtualisation or web technologies like Django or Ruby On Rails. We are the meetup for innovation in Glarus.

description:
Although, it's just a few months old, Live Streaming (Periscope & Meerkat) is fast becoming an incredible way to build your business. The community is growing quickly, and so let's take this medium offline to connect with the people we're meeting online!

If you are currently a member of Periscope this is going to be a Monthly MeetUp for us to get Connected and Support each other. 

Also, for Business Owners or individuals who are interested in Periscope and want to know how it can take you to the next level. Please join us also!

We'll be getting together to discuss the best uses for the Periscope app, to highlight Periscopers of interest, and to learn from those who are putting this live streaming technology to market themselves and their businesses for social good or financial gain. Who should join?

If you're an active user of the Periscope live streaming app, or are currently on the outside looking in, and are wondering how your personal or professional profile could benefit from becoming a Periscope user, you'll be welcome at our events.

Why you should join:

It can be tricky figuring out the best way to use a new platform or technology. There are always those early adopters who "get it" straight away, grow their profile, and reap the benefits of a more visible online presence. Our intention is to share those experiences and ideas, and to help the group collaborate in growing each other's profile on Periscope and beyond.

What can you expect?

A mix of networking over informal drinks, and some knowledge share. We'll be having guest speakers (eventually) who have "made it" on Periscope, and have them share their successes, how they did it, and suggest ways for our Zürich Periscopers to make the app work for their own specific needs.

Periscope is a live streaming video app, created by Twitter. We who consider ourselves Broadcasters, want an opportunity to meet other "Scopers" or Broadcasters in person! This meetup is a way to foster the community of people brave enough to show up online LIVE, living authentically, and sharing ourselves, our community, and our lives with the world!

Come join our fellow Periscopers, let's scope together and make real world connections through this incredible app!

Je nach Bedarf können die Meetups auch in deutsch sein.
name: Zürich Periscope Meetup

description:
Collab Lab is a new meetup in Zurich focused on collaboration and innovation.  This will be a place to experiment and try out, test and warp different techniques associated with participative-decision making, creative and analytical thinking, information visualisation and synthesis, idea generation, thinking frameworks, innovation games and more.

Who should join?

Do you work with other people to solve problems?  Do you need to come up with new ways to do things to be successful?  Are you bored with the way you currently work?

Have you ever been bored in a meeting?

Then Collab Lab is for you.  It doesn't matter if you're a musician trying to make new music with a band, a manager trying to get people to stay awake during meetings or a CEO trying to build consensus across their company.

Why should I join?

Because you want to make your workplace better, because somewhere inside you know there is a better way to work, because you understand that sustainable, robust and innovative solutions are ones where everybody has contributed input .

Most of all you're tired of listening to other people talk about new ideas and you're ready to try them out for yourself.  This is not a passive MeetUp, active participation is required.  You will learn by doing.

--

Come join our group and become a better collaborative problem solver.

-Ryan

http://collablab.ch

http://twitter.com/labcollab
name: Collab Lab

"Be the change you want to see in the world", That's what everyone talks about. My question is... What does that look like? What kind of new inter-personal relationships do we create because of it? description:
This meetup group by www.skaylah.org has been created to help people develop both their Spiritual and Business life, combining ancient wisdom with modern living, and learning how to balance those two aspects. We are holding Meetups for spiritual entrepreneurs and goddesses in following areas:

Business Bliss
Align yourself with your highest good and true desire to create an authentic AND successful business in the spirit of service. Participants share tools that helped them grow a thriving, spiritual business.

Soul Branding
Brand your products and/or services from the heart to share your purpose through marketing that attracts and inspires your soul tribe being your true self. Participants inspire each other to see bellow the surface.

Fruitful Networking
Create and master prosperity in your business through holistic approach. You will learn how to generate the success you desire using the law of attraction & spiritual selling. Participants collaborate together. 

Sacred B2B Circles (goddesses only)
Radiate your inner business goddess while collaborating with your fellow goddesses so we can grow together and understand why it is that when woman gather in circle miraculous things happen. Participants grow.


We believe that we live in a kaleidoscope of endless, eternally unfolding possibilities. The shifting motifs of the timeless merging with the evolving wisdom; the sacred with the ordinary; old medicine infused with new; old things in new ways and new things in old ways. At “Business Bliss & Soul Empowerment" we create experiences from a brew of ancient wisdom mixed with modern science, flavored with creative tension of logic and faith, serenity and passion, flow and friction that delight, inspire and transform workplaces, community circles, and causes we care about.

Any Zug area (or if you don't mind traveling to Zug)photographer, amateur and professional alike, will benefit from this meetup to learn and expand their skillset in portraiture, fashion and fine art photography and be able to apply these principles to other photographic disciplines.

description:
Diese Gruppe hat Interesse am personenorientierten Malen ( begleitetes Malen) und Lösungsorientiertem Malen ( LOM®). for english version please scroll up.

Im Personenorientierten Malen entsteht das Bild aus dem ersten Impuls heraus. Der Malprozess steht im Zentrum und ist offen. Es gibt keine Themenvorgaben. Wir malen stehend, soweit möglich, mit der Hand langsam, gerade das was kommt. Das langsame Malen dessen was gerade ist, verringert Ängste, stärkt das Selbstwertgefühl und fördert deine ureigene Kreativität. 

Beim Lösungsorientierten Malen können konkrete Anliegen bearbeitet werden. Belastende Ereignisse, störende Symptome, konfliktbehaftete Beziehungen und vieles andere Themen können durch das Erarbeiten neuer klarer Bilder in unserem Gehirn überschrieben werden und führen so zu Entlastung und Befreiung. Mehr Lebenszufriedenheit und neuen Perspektiven garantiert. Das langsame Malen mit der Hand ist dabei ebenfalls unterstützend.

Jeder kann diese Art zu malen erlernen. Es braucht keine künstlerischen Vorraussetzungen.  

Verschiedene Zeiten für die Zusammenkünfte sind möglich. Die die es sich leisten können dürfen gerne einen Solidarbeitrag zahlen, für Sans Papiers und Flüchtlinge gratis. 

This group is interested in painting people-oriented (Assisted Paint) and solution-orientet painting (LOM®).

 Person-oriented painting arises by your first impulsion. The process of painting stands in the center and is open. There are no topics specifications. We paint standing as far as possible, by hand slowly, what comes up. To paint slowly and with attention reduces anxiety, strengthens self-worth promotes your personal creativity.

The Solution-oriented painting offers the possibility to treat special concerns. Stressful events, disturbing symptoms, conflicted relationships, and many other topics can be overridden by the elaboration of new clear images in our brains and thus lead to relief and liberation. More satisfaction in life and new perspectives guaranteed. To paint slowly and with attention is very supportive. 

There are no artistic experience necessary. Different times for die gatherings are possible. Those who can afford it pay a little bit more for those who need it. It is free for SANS-Papiers and refugees.
name: Zürich Joy of free Painting Meet up

description:
The club was founded ~2004 by a group of friends from all over the world. Friends brought friends, so the group grew and flourished. And since playing makes us hungry, we usually have dinner after the game... in a rotating choice of restaurants! Beginners are welcome, we try to rotate everyone around so that everyone has fun. If you want to improve, ask one of the members and we can help you improve your technique. 


FAQ

• Do you speak German
If you want. We have members from all around the world, so English is usually the easiest. 

• Do you have to eat after playing in order to participate?
No, but its always fun if you can. 

• Are you in the Swiss Badminton League? 
No, this is a social club, we have a lot of fun and laughs between some good ralies. Many of our members are in the league, and come here to enjoy the game a bit.

• Do you play with feathers or plastic?
Only feathers. We warm up with the bruised ones. The cost is included in the 17CHF.

• How much is it?
17CHF for visitors for 1.5 hours, sometimes we play a bit longer - look for Lily or Michael to pay.
name: Badminton and Dining Club | Zürich

description: Does this describe you? • You give a lot of yourself in what you do but don’t feel that you are acknowledged nor appreciated enough… • You feel there is definitely more to life; that you are ready to lift off to the next level yet it is just not happening… • You feel unsure on how to deal with changes in your life… If yes and you are ready to change it, the Yinfluence workshop is for you! and yes, this is for both women and men! We want to be mission-driven leaders, thinkers and doers with a deep desire to make a difference in the world. Obviously, having a ridiculous amount of fun and an epic adventure along the way. Building lifelong friendships - taking our life, career and business to the next levels - collaborating on new business ventures - learning cutting-edge new economy systems & tools – living live unapologetically- tackling issues that improve lives. All these mean only one thing: we have to break the limitations and shells we created around ourselves. Literally to BREAK FREE from our own self-imposed “prisons”. With fun-filled and active participation, Yinfluence brings about mind-sets, paradigms, skills, tools and network of inspired individuals to lift us to new heights the minute the workshop ends. It’s like an “Aha” moment that lasts. Facilitated by Dr. Mel Gill, a world-renowned Executive and Life Coach, Motivational Speaker, Psychotherapist, Best-Selling Author and the Producer of the Movie sequel to “The Secret” called THE META SECRET, Yinfluence is going to take us on a journey towards our inner world to realign with our own feminine power. Yes, the Feminine Power within both women and men! Everyone is born with the Yin (the feminine energy) and Yang (the masculine energy). These energies manifest in how we feel, think, and connect with others and ourselves. Keeping Yin and Yang equilibrium is essential to be the fuller version of us, to communicate more impactfully to the opposite gender, to say the least! In the world we live in today, our Yang is usually over tapped and we underutilise or even neglect our Yin, often unconsciously. This must change! Yinfluence is an exploration and realignment process with the Yin in each of us. Using psychology and Common Sense peppered with the latest findings in Neuroscience, we will get clarity on how the blockages are built on and around our Yin qualities to then transform the energy within into Power that moves us forward and above. Let's take this quantum leap together! Price: Early bird price (paid before Sept 30th 2015): CHF 380 (incl. VAT) Full price: CHF495 (incl. VAT) Special price for groups of 2 or more, contact us at events@almarea.ch For more information and to register, please visit www.almarea.ch/event/index And watch Dr. Mel Gill's video answering questions from registered audiences about Yinfluence here: https://www.facebook.com/events/547739155378983/ For more info about Dr. Mel Gill, please visit www.metasecret.com In Almarea, we help our clients to identify and unleash their full potential through recruitment, executive & life coaching, consulting and personal development events. description:
This is a group for all those are interested in Buddhist meditation and Thai massage, I moved to Zurich recently and would like to meet people to share my knowledge. I made different courses in Thailand in 2014 and 2015, this year I lived there for a while and learmed a lot with Thai culture.

Thai Massage:
What is today called "Thai massage" or "Thai yoga massage" is an ancient healing system combining acupressure, Indian Ayurvedic principles, and assisted yoga postures.
The recipient of the massage wears loose, comfortable clothing and lies on a mat or firm mattress on the floor. In Thailand the massage is often given to a group of a dozen or so subjects receiving massage simultaneously in the same large room. The true ancient style of the massage requires that the massage be performed solo with just the giver and receiver. The receiver will be positioned in a variety of yoga-like positions during the course of the massage, that are also combined with deep static and rhythmic pressures.
The founder of Thai massage and medicine is said to have been Shivago Komarpaj (ชีวกโกมารภัจจ์ Jīvaka Komarabhācca), who is said in the Pāli Buddhist canon to have been the Buddha's physician over 2,500 years ago.
If you are interested in this, please, join me. Meditation:
The identifying feature of Dhammakaya meditation is the meditator's attention towards the centre of the body as two finger breadths above the navel.
This approach say this is the same point as the end-point of the deepest breath in mindfulness of breathing meditation.
Techniques: breathing, mantra and visualization.

Language: English
Peace and love,
Kenya
name: Thai massage and meditation in Zürich

Genug von langweiligen "How to Bootstrap X" in Java Meetups oder Firmenpräsentationen die die wirklich spannenden Details auslassen? Willst du Diskutieren wie Hibernate genau seine Transaktionen committed? Oder einfach das Abenteuer deiner wochenlangen Bughunt gleichgesinnten schildern?

description:
The Graduate Business Intelligence & Data Analytics Inititative (GBIDAI) is an initiative that aims to create an environment where students both undergraduates and graduates can learn about Business Intelligence & Analytics at an introductory, intermediate, and/or advanced level. The initiative's main objective is to equip students with the right skills to enter the growing and expanding market of Business Intelligence & Analytics.

As a member of the GBIAI you will be able to learn about the different tools, methods, and technologies being used within the Business Intelligence & Analytic community. You will be exposed to real-world use case scenarios of Business Intelligence & Analytics in the industry and academia. You will learn about how machine learning is used to predict stock market trends, how natural language processing is used to determine the sentiment on a particular topic, how programming languages like R and Python are leading the way in performing data analysis, how NoSQL databases are providing a new paradigm to store unstructured data retrieved from social networks, sensors, log files, etc., how technologies like Hadoop are revolutionising data processing and parallel computing, how recommendations systems work inside Amazon, Netflix, Spotify, how DNA sequencing is being facilitated by machine learning algorithms, how data mining is helping in better understanding human-environment interactions and social economic dynamics, how predictive analytics is helping today's business leaders in making key decisions and transforming their businesses into huge success stories and many more. Besides the intellectual juice we'll provide with a warm and welcoming social environment. 

What are the events organized by GBIAI like? 

The events usually include technical presentations on topics relevant to Business Intelligence & Analytics at an introductory/intermediate/or advanced level. They are followed by a networking session where members can have the chance to enjoy friendly conversations. 


Do I need to have prior technical/programming knowledge to join the GBIAI?

 No programming knowledge is required to attend our events. The events are dedicated to people coming from a range of disciplines and experiences with a passion for Business Intelligence & Analytics. 

Is there a membership fee?

 Joining the GDSI is absolutely free. 


What do I benefit by joining the GBIAI? 

You will have the opportunity to learn about cutting edge technologies and industry practices currently being applied in Big Data projects across a range of industry sectors. Furthermore, you will have the chance to meet interesting people and forge new contacts that will prove to be valuable in the future for your personal and career development. 


How do I register for an event? 

To register for an event you must first join our meetup group. You can do that by clicking on the 'Join Us' button on the top-right corner. After you join us, you will be able to explore future events and add yourself to the attendees list. It's that simple! 

Do check our blog at:  https://gbiablog.wordpress.com


Amir Rushiti 
MSC Business Intelligence and Data Analytics,   University of Westminster, London
Founder of the Business Intelligence & Data Analytics Initiative.
name: Graduate Business Intelligence &Data Analytics Inititative

description:
We live in an ever-shrinking world, where the technologies and transportation systems make it easier than ever to connect people from every corner of the world. We also have the fortune to live in a quality and international city that is home to people of diverse backgrounds and life experience. This Group gives you an opportunity to experience some of the many international cultures that this country hosts, to share your knowledge of cultural heritage, interests/hobbies or professional expertise with other members of the group, and make new friends while doing so. The mission of this group is as implied by the name of the group--we'd like to provide good company as well as a positive and safe environment for members to experience things that, for whatever reasons, you longed for but weren't able to do before. You'll also get to know things that you can do and enjoy in Zürich and Environment through the meetups proposed by your peers. It is also a hope of our group to promote cross-cultural dialogues, sharing, understanding, and peer supports through a variety of local activities and events, as well as international trips.

But we (organizers) are few and you are many, and this means that to work toward these goals we need the proactive participation and supports from at least some members of the community. This group is unique because of our members, and we look forward to meeting you and facilitate the meetup ideas you propose.

------------------------------

Interested in a festival or music performance? Crave for dining at an exotic restaurant? Interested in hiking with a group? Can't find teammates/players for a sport, hobby, or fun stuff (e.g., bowling, basketball, badminton, dance, or a silly fun game)?

* Any Member Can Schedule a Meetup at This Group for Free:)

This is a group in Zürich where people get to discover the city together in a fun and safe environment. People who are familiar with the city and the environment are of course welcome to join us and even provide meeting ideas. Newcomers to Zürich and the environment are also more than welcome to join us and explore this place together! We aim at building a safe and friendly community. You don't need to have experience overseas or be able to speak English to join this group. Every friendly person is welcome in this group! (Including people local in Switzerland or (originally) from other parts of the world.) If you happen to be traveling to Zurich, you are welcome to join our group and events as well:) If you are currently overseas but have a plan to visit or stay here in the near future, still welcome join the group.

EVERYONE IS WELCOME!

Join our upbeat and friendly international community;

* Meet People from All Walks of Life *

If you enjoy friendship, activities, music, arts, networking, socializing, parties, learning, sharing, inspiration, personal/professional development, travel, culture, language, and/or some fun, and you like them for free, this is the group for you!!

------------------------------

Dear friends, This new group is part of an effort for establishing a network of global meetups, currently being fast deployed in major cities worldwide, including Hong Kong, LA, London, Montreal, New York, Paris, San Francisco, Shanghai, Thailand, Tokyo, Toronto, Zurich...

And more to come! Our only agenda is to build up a global community, where participants get to mix and mingle in a safe and friendly environment, have fun and adventures together or establish long-lasting friendship and fully enjoy what the city's got to offer. We believe that this service can be offered for free, and we need your participation and encouragement to make it happen.

If you are fond of our vision, welcome to join and check it out.

Invite your friends who may be interested. We appreciate your supports, volunteering, and valuable inputs, but nothing is mandatory except for mutual respects to other members in the community.

Cheers,

Marcel

Organizer
name: I wanted to do that... Just not alone! (free)

Zusammen mit den Karten bringen Sie latent vorhandene Gedanken ans Tageslicht, ohne zu viel von sich Preis zu geben.

Für alle, die mit einer Reflexion Ihre Motivation zur Lösungsfindung anregen wollen und die Karten als Stimulierungsimpuls einsetzen möchten.

description:
Welcome to the most enjoyable single meetup group in Zurich! We organize creative, amusing meetups in Zurich and neighbourhood for singles at least ones a month. Now we introduce you how the single group is set up

A) We meet at a certain place in the city, in a pub, bar or at an event. The date, place and time is always announced in the event description.

B) We introduce each other and get to know the guests. After 30-60min. we form groups with 2-4 persons, and the small groups will go together to meet people at the event, in the bar or pub. The group needs to meet people they don’t know and they are not in the meetup group registered. Of course everything happens on voluntary actions.;)

C) The group of 4 persons can be mixed with boys and girls, or it can be only boys groups or girls group, the preferences of each person is important to form a group.

D) The group helps each other introduce unknown persons in a pub, bar or event, of course those persons which the persons of the group would like to get to know.

E) You can bring with you ONE guest (NOT MORE, Thank you!), please also communicate the guest when you sign up for a meetup event.

Requirement to join the meetup group: + You need to be a single, your age is between 25 and 35 years, both girls and boys are welcome + Your meetup profile pictures has to show your face visible from the front or side view. From the back or no face picture is NOT acceptable to join the group + You are willing to join the meetups, if you don’t join the meetup once than you will be cancelled from the group meetup list + You like to meet persons, you are communicative and you like to get to know you persons that you don’t know yet. + You need to speak one of these languages: Swizzerdütsch, deutsch or english.

The organizer reserves the rights to delete persons from the meetup group list without any further notice. Remark: The first event will be announced when we have at least 20 “SAY HELLO” members.
name: Single “SAY HELLO” Events Zurich
